original_title: Christmas at the Fun Song Factory
overview: It's Christmas at the Fun Song Factory and Ozzie Octave, the fuzzy Fun Song Factory Foreman, is busy decorating the factory as a Christmas Surprise for everyone. The factory is bursting at the seams with festive fun. There are lots of traditional carols and favourite Christmas songs to join in with and don't forget to hang up your stocking just in case Santa Claus comes down the Chimney. Merry Christmas to you all!
tagline: Favourite Christmas songs and carols to sing along to
title: Christmas at the Fun Song Factory
